errors.title: Oopsie woopsie!

discord.access_denied:
While signing in you denied access to your Discord account.
In order to sign in, you need to allow access to your Discord account.
In case you denied access out of concern for your account, we do not do anything to your account without giving us your explicit permission.
discord.invalid_code:
Something went wrong while signing in. The code provided by Discord is invalid.
Please try again. If the problem persists, try again in a few minutes.
In case this still doesn't solve the issue, please contact us.

osu.invalid_code:
Something went wrong while signing in. The code provided by osu! is invalid.
Please try again. If the problem persists, try again in a few minutes.
In case this still doesn't solve the issue, please contact us.
osu.no_state:
Something went wrong while signing in. The code provided by osu! can't be verified.
Please try again. If the problem persists, try again in a few minutes.
In case this still doesn't solve the issue, please contact us.
osu.no_code:
Something went wrong while signing in. The code provided by osu! is invalid.
Please try again. If the problem persists, try again in a few minutes.
In case this still doesn't solve the issue, please contact us.
osu.authentication_failed:
Failed to authenticate with osu!
Please try again. If the problem persists, try again in a few minutes.
In case this still doesn't solve the issue, please contact us.

errors.404: This page does not exist, uwu.
